name: Non-Profit
description: Organizations that operate for charitable, educational, or community service purposes.
benefits: Community support,networking opportunities, access to grants and funding

name: Bronze
description: Basic membership level for small businesses and individuals.
benefits: Basic listing in the chamber directory, access to member events, and newsletters.

name: Silver
description: Enhanced membership level with additional benefits.
benefits: All Bronze benefits, plus promotional opportunities and access to exclusive events.

name: Gold
description: Premium membership level for established businesses.
benefits: All Silver benefits, plus priority listing in the directory, featured promotions, and networking events.
